products.name: Pistachios
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Snacks,Nuts and their products,Nuts,Pistachios,Salted pistachios,Shelled pistachios
products.facts: ["Pistachios are a source of healthy fats, protein, and fiber, making them a nutritious snack option.","Pistachio trees thrive in arid climates and require minimal water compared to other nut trees, contributing to sustainable agriculture.","The shells of pistachios are often left on during packaging, which helps protect the nuts from damage and preserves their quality.","Pistachios are harvested in late summer to early fall, and their vibrant green color indicates high levels of antioxidants."]

products.name: Nature Valley Sweet & Salty Nut Cashew
products.ingredientsText: Whole Grain Oats, Corn Syrup, Cashews Roasted in Safflower Oil, Sugar, Rice Flour, Palm Kernel Oil, Fructose, Tapioca Syrup, Vegetable Glycerin, Cashew Butter (cashew nuts, safflower oil), Canola Oil, Whey, Salt, Soy Lecithin, Corn Starch, Barley Malt Extract, Honey Roasted Almond Butter (almonds, honey, maltodextrin, palm oil, mixed tocopherols), Peanut Flour, Baking Soda, Natural Flavor, Vitamin E (mixed tocopherols)
products.facts: ["Contains whole nuts and crunchy granola for a satisfying texture.","Made with real cashews and natural sweeteners for a balanced flavor.","Packaging is recyclable, promoting eco-friendly disposal.","No artificial flavors or colors, ensuring a high-quality snack option."]

products.name: Cheerios
products.ingredientsText: whole grain oats, whole grain corn, sugar, corn starch, corn bran, whole grain rice, whole grain sorghum, whole grain millet, brown sugar syrup, salt, tripotassium phosphate, color (caramel color and annatto extract), vitamin e (mixed tocopherols) added to preserve freshness, vitamins and minerals: calcium carbonate, zinc and iron (mineral nutrients), a b vitamin (niacinamide), a b vitamin (calcium pantothenate), vitamin c (sodium ascorbate), vitamin bs (pyridoxine hydrochloride), vitamin b2 (riboflavin), vitamin b, (thiamin mononitrate), a b vitamin (folic acid), vitamin a (palmitate), vitamin b12, vitamin d,
products.labels: Kosher, en:No artificial flavors, en:No gluten, en:Orthodox Union Kosher
products.facts: ["Cheerios are made primarily from whole grain oats, providing a good source of dietary fiber.","The packaging for Cheerios is recyclable, supporting eco-friendly practices.","Cheerios are free from artificial colors and flavors, ensuring a quality product.","The brand emphasizes sustainability by sourcing oats from farmers who practice responsible farming methods."]

products.name: Wheat Chex Cereal
products.ingredientsText: whole grain wheat, sugar, salt, molasses, baking soda, vitamin e (mixed tocopherols) added to preserve freshness,vitamins and minerals: calcium carbonate, iron and zinc (mineral nutrients), vitamin c (sodium ascorbate), a b vitamin (niacinamide), vitamin b6 (pyridoxine hydrochloride), vitamin b2 (riboflavin), a b vitamin (folic acid), vitamin b1 (thiamin mononitrate), vitamin a (palmitate), vitamin b12, vitamin d3,
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, extruded cereals
products.facts: ["Wheat Chex is made primarily from whole grain wheat, providing a good source of dietary fiber.","The packaging for Wheat Chex is recyclable, helping to reduce environmental impact.","Wheat Chex is low in sugar, making it a healthier breakfast option compared to many sugary cereals.","The cereal is fortified with essential vitamins and minerals, enhancing its nutritional quality."]

products.name: Nature Valley Crunchy Variety Pack
products.ingredientsText: Whole Grain Oats, Sugar, Canola and/or Sunflower Oil, Rice Flour, Honey, Salt, Brown Sugar Syrup, Baking Soda, Soy Lecithin, Natural Flavor.
products.facts: ["Made with whole grain oats as the primary ingredient.","Contains no artificial flavors or colors, promoting natural ingredients.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, supporting eco-friendly practices.","Nature Valley sources ingredients from sustainable farming practices to minimize environmental impact."]

products.name: Cinnamon Toast Crunch
products.ingredientsText: Whole grain wheat, sugar, rice flour, canola oil, sunflower oil, fructose, maltodextrin, dextrose, salt, cinnamon, trisodium phosphate, soy lecithin, caramel color, rosemary extract, bht added to preserve freshness, vitamins and minerals (calcium carbonate, vitamin c (sodium ascorbate), iron and zinc (mineral nutrients), a b vitamin (niacinamide), vitamin b6 (pyridoxine hydrochloride), vitamin b1 (thiamin mononitrate), vitamin a (palmitate), vitamin b2 (riboflavin), a b vitamin (folic acid), vitamin b12, vitamin d3).
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Breakfasts,Cereals and potatoes,Cereals and their products,Breakfast cereals,Extruded cereals
products.facts: ["Cinnamon Toast Crunch is made primarily from whole grain wheat and rice.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting eco-friendly practices.","It contains no artificial colors or flavors, ensuring a quality product.","The cereal is fortified with essential vitamins and minerals, enhancing its nutritional value."]

products.name: crème de coco Kokos
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Beverages, Plant-based foods, Dairy substitutes, Milk substitutes, Plant-based beverages, Plant-based milk alternatives, Cooking helpers, Plant-based creams, Plant-based creams for cooking, Coconut milks and creams, Cremes-de-coco
products.facts: ["CrÃ¨me de coco Kokos is made from high-quality coconut cream and water, ensuring a rich and creamy texture.","The product is often packaged in recyclable materials, promoting eco-friendliness and reducing waste.","CrÃ¨me de coco Kokos does not contain artificial preservatives or additives, maintaining its natural flavor and quality.","Many brands source coconuts from sustainable farms, supporting eco-friendly agricultural practices."]

products.name: The Original Dried Cranberries
products.ingredientsText: Dried Cranberries (sugar, cranberries), refined sunflower oil.
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Snacks, Fruits and vegetables based foods, Fruits based foods, Dried products, Dried plant-based foods, Dried fruits, Dried cranberries
products.facts: ["Made from high-quality, whole cranberries that are carefully dried to preserve flavor and nutrients.","Sourced from sustainable farms that prioritize eco-friendly practices and responsible harvesting methods.","Free from artificial preservatives, colors, and flavors, ensuring a natural product for consumers.","Packaged in a resealable bag to maintain freshness and reduce waste, promoting environmentally conscious consumption."]

products.name: Cheesy classic alfredo sauce
products.ingredientsText: water, soybean oil, cream, parmesan cheese (part-skim milk, cheese cultures, salt, enzymes), modified corn starch, enzymes modified egg yolk, whey, salt, romano cheese (pasteurized part-skim milk, cheese cultures, salt, enzymes), whey protein concentrate, xanthan gum, autolyzed yeast extract, disodium phosphate, garlic powder, spice, natural flavor,
products.categories: Condiments, Sauces, Pasta sauces, Groceries, en:alfredo-sauces
products.facts: ["Made with high-quality ingredients including cream, butter, and Parmesan cheese.","Typically contains no artificial preservatives or flavors, ensuring a more natural taste.","Packaging is often recyclable, contributing to reduced environmental impact.","Produced in facilities that adhere to strict quality control standards for food safety."]

products.name: Original greek nonfat yogurt
products.ingredientsText: cultured grade a non fat milk, water, fructose, contains less than 1% of modified food starch, natural and artificial flavors, sucralose, citric acid, potassium sorbate (to maintain freshness), acesulfame potassium, sodium citrate, active yogurt cultures l, bulgaricus , s, thermophilus,
products.categories: Dairies, Fermented foods, Desserts, Fermented milk products, Dairy desserts, Fermented dairy desserts, Yogurts, Vanilla yogurt, Greek-style yogurts
products.facts: ["Made from skim milk, resulting in lower fat content while maintaining protein levels.","Typically produced using traditional straining methods, which enhances its thickness and creaminess.","Often contains live active cultures, contributing to gut health and probiotics.","Sourced from local farms, promoting sustainable agriculture and reducing carbon footprint."]
